originalText.text: Unfortunately they lost a kid-sized blue and white dress and a green t-shirt in wash and fold. If anyone is given them, let me know! The store did seem to try to track it down but I suspect their factory lost it. The store asked the factory to look at cameras and they said they did. But both my wife and I are sure we included these two pieces of clothing

The store did seem to try to track it down but I suspect their factory lost it. The store asked the factory to look at cameras and they said they did. But both my wife and I are sure we included these two pieces of clothing

originalText.text:
We used this service for years without issues. Until last month they lost two items totaling $1,000 (blue blazer and white sweater). They refused to admit their mistake and are blaming that our doormen switched the blue blazer and white sweater in our bag with someone else’s two white dress shirts. We reviewed the cameras in our building and their claim is false. No one tampered with the laundry bag that we left which was picked up by their service.

We even told them on the phone (when we called them to come pick up our dry cleaning) what was in that laundry bag so they knew to expect a blue blazer and white sweater. Those two dress shirts are someone else’s.

They also failed to reimburse us for the $17 dry cleaning bill despite our returning the shirts to them (as they were not ours). Interestingly they have cameras in their shop but are constantly asking us to check our building’s camera.

There are many other better dry cleaning services on the UWS close by.

originalText.text: Highly recommended! Excellent for getting your shirts cleaned & pressed or for dry cleaning. My clothes always come out looking great. These guys are the best!

text.text: Highly recommended! Excellent for getting your shirts cleaned & pressed or for dry cleaning. My clothes always come out looking great. These guys are the best!

originalText.text: I use them every week for laundry. They do such a great job and pickup and delivery right from my apartment

text.text: I use them every week for laundry. They do such a great job and pickup and delivery right from my apartment

originalText.text: I have been bringing the slipcover on my oversized white linen couch here for annual cleanings for many years. They do an outstanding job removing challenging stains, which look like they never even happened. And I only bring clothing to dry clean 1-2 times a year in large batches, but they somehow remember me every time and are unbelievably nice, as if I just been there the week before. At least 5 years ago I noticed that a single silk blouse was missing after delivery (one of more than 50 items I brought to them that one time) and they quickly located it and delivered it. The woman who works there was very, very apologetic, such that she still points out the blouse and re-apologizes to me every time I've brought it back for another cleaning! Clearly, they genuinely care a lot about their work and I'd venture to say that mistakes must happen exceptionally rarely based on my experience. Like another person that posted here, I also go out of my way to use Spotmaster Cleaners, because I prefer to use their dry cleaning services instead of the others much closer to where I live.
